lead_paragraph: Hopes that a recent tenuous peace deal and cease-fire would pacify Mali’s restive, separatist-minded north have diminished as rival ethnic factions clashed recently.

headline.print_headline: Attacks on U.N. Force Add to Unrest in Mali
headline.main: Attacks on U.N. Force Add to Unrest in Mali

snippet: Hopes that a recent tenuous peace deal and cease-fire would pacify Mali’s restive, separatist-minded north have diminished as rival ethnic factions clashed recently.
abstract: Armed groups attack each other as well as United Nations peacekeepers and Malian soldiers adding to unrest in Mali.
